alert.note: Alert for Lee; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 3:06PM EDT until June 24 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Eastern Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 306 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Smithville, or 12 miles south of Americus, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Albany, Smithville, Bronwood, Chokee, Stocks, Forrester, Bridges Crossroad, Palmyra, Century, Jordan Place, Starksville, Byne Crossroads, Scrutchins, Armena, Olivers Mill, Neyami, Philema and Mossy Dell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
